quote: Syllabus khatam hone se pehle toh semester khatam ho gaya.
speaker: You, crying internally

quote: Tera CGPA dekh ke HR ne resume open bhi nahi kiya.
speaker: Reality

quote: Assignment deadline kal thi? Oh... tabhi neend achhi aayi thi.
speaker: Brain at 3AM

quote: Beta, marks toh ache aaye hain... par kisi aur ke.
speaker: Dad

quote: Tera answer sheet dekh ke teacher ne pen hi chhod diya.
speaker: Rumour

quote: Group project mein tu 'moral support' ban ke raha hai bas.
speaker: Team Leader

quote: 3rd year mein ho, aur abhi tak 'bas iss baar seriously padh lunga' keh rahe ho?
speaker: Future You

quote: Padosi ke beta ne IIT crack kar liya, tu kya kar raha hai?
speaker: Dad

quote: Hamare time pe 1 pen se 3 saal nikal jaate the.
speaker: Dada Ji

quote: Log kya kahenge?
speaker: Every Indian Parent Ever

quote: Aakhir ko ladki hi toh hai… zyada padh ke kya karegi?
speaker: Toxic Relative

quote: Din bhar phone ghusa rehta hai... battery nahi, akal bhi khatam ho gayi hai.
speaker: Savage Mummy

quote: bhaiya coding seekh lo... web series se toh naukri nahi milegi.
speaker: Choti bhen

quote: Beta, padhai pe dhyaan do. Pyaar vyaar sab faltu hai.
speaker: Mom

quote: didi coding seekh lo... snap streak aur insta posts se toh naukri nahi milegi.
speaker: Choti bhen

quote: Aise hi phone mein ghuse rahoge toh aankhen chali jayengi.
speaker: Mom

quote: Beta, ghar aake chai banana seekh lo, bahu banne mein madad milegi.
speaker: Masi

quote: 10th board ka result aaya toh xyz milega(mujhe aaj tk nhi mila)!
speaker: Dad

quote: Ek baar government job lag jaye, zindagi set hai.
speaker: Indian Dad

quote: Tumhare liye toh sab kuch karte hain, aur tum ho ki….
speaker: Mom (Emotional Blackmail Edition)

quote: Pehle naukri, phir pyaar.
speaker: Society Planner

quote: Pata nhi dinbhar laptop me ghus ke kya krte hai ye bacche!
speaker: Mom after calling us 200 times for khana

quote: Hamare time pe toh 3 km paidal jaake school jaate the.
speaker: Dad (Nostalgia Mode)

quote: Result 95% aaya toh bhi ‘itna kam kyun?’
speaker: Perfectionist Parent

quote: Tumhe sab kuch asani se milgya to tumhe kadar nhi hai.
speaker: Dad (kinda true)

quote: Kya zarurat thi phone mein password lagane ki?
speaker: Suspisious Bhai Bhen

quote: Khud ke kapde dhone lagenge toh akal aayegi!
speaker: Mom, frustrated

quote: Kal se subah 5 baje uthega, samjha?
speaker: Disciplinary Dad

quote: Tu adopted hai, tujhe railway station se uthaya tha.
speaker: Elder Sibling

quote: Mummy ke favourite toh mai hi hu, hamesha se tha.
speaker: Sibling

quote: Main kaam karu toh farz, tu kare toh help.
speaker: Middle Child

quote: Marks ache aaye toh mummy ka beta, kam aaye toh papa ka.
speaker: Petty Sibling

quote: Khud ka kaam mujhse karwata hai, aur mummy se kehta hai main kuch nahi karta.
speaker: Victim Mode Activated

quote: Mummy mujhe hamesha daantti hai, tujhe toh kuch bolti bhi nahi.
speaker: Younger Sibling

quote: Mere toys bhi tujhe diye the, aur ab Wi-Fi bhi le raha hai.
speaker: Elder Sibling, fed up

quote: Tu toh tab aaya jab sab khatam ho chuka tha – pyaar bhi, paisa bhi.
speaker: Burnt-Out Elder Sibling

quote: Mummy ko teri chhoti si choti baat yaad hai, meri birthday bhi bhool jaati hai.
speaker: Emotionally Damaged Sibling
